topics.title: Mind & Consciousness
topics.description: Explore the Vedic understanding of consciousness, thought, and awareness
topics.summary: The Rig Veda explores consciousness through manas (mind), chitta (awareness), and buddhi (intellect) - concepts that still resonate in neuroscience and meditation today.

topics.title: Physical Health & Vitality
topics.description: Discover ancient wisdom on physical strength, vitality, and well-being
topics.summary: The Ashvins, divine physicians, represent healing and vitality. Hymns celebrate life force (prana), strength (bala), and the power of natural remedies.

topics.title: Mental Wellbeing
topics.description: Ancient approaches to peace, contentment, and emotional balance
topics.summary: Hymns address inner peace (shanti), contentment (santosha), and overcoming fear. The Vedic approach to mental health combines ritual, meditation, and community.

topics.title: Purpose & Dharma
topics.description: Understand duty, righteousness, and life's meaning
topics.summary: Dharma (righteous duty) and rita (cosmic order) form the foundation of purposeful living. Hymns guide seekers toward their unique path in the cosmic dance.

topics.title: Nature & Environment
topics.description: Celebrate the natural world and humanity's relationship with it
topics.summary: Hymns to Ushas (dawn), Surya (sun), Apas (waters), and Prithivi (earth) express profound reverence for nature and ecological interdependence.

topics.title: Ethics & Righteousness
topics.description: Explore truth, justice, and moral conduct
topics.summary: The concept of satya (truth) and rita (cosmic law) guide ethical behavior. Varuna watches over oaths and punishes transgressions of moral order.

topics.title: Relationships & Community
topics.description: Understanding bonds of friendship, family, and society
topics.summary: Mitra embodies friendship and social bonds. Hymns emphasize hospitality, brotherhood, and the sacred nature of human connection.

topics.title: Death & Existence
topics.description: Contemplate mortality, the afterlife, and the nature of being
topics.summary: The Nasadiya Sukta questions creation itself. Yama, first mortal, rules the realm of ancestors. Deep philosophical inquiries into existence and non-existence.

topics.title: Energy & Transformation
topics.description: Harness transformative power and vital energy
topics.summary: Agni transforms offerings into divine nourishment. Soma catalyzes change. Understanding tejas (inner fire) and tapas (transformative heat).

topics.title: Success & Prosperity
topics.summary: Indra grants victory and strength. Lakshmi (wealth) and prosperity hymns guide material and spiritual success. Balance ambition with dharma.

metadata.note: Each topic contains carefully curated hymns that speak to modern concerns while preserving ancient wisdom
